actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Whomping Slam or Rock attacks. If both Slams hit 1 target each creature within 5 ft. of target: 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage and knocked prone (DC 15 Dex negates damage and prone).

actions.name: Whomping Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 18 (3d8+5) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Large or smaller creature it must make DC 15 Str save or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit 60/180' one target 16 (2d10+5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Fossil Barrage (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Stone shards in 30' cone. Each creature in area: 28 (8d6) piercing damage (DC 15 Dex half).

special_abilities.name: Earth Glide
special_abilities.desc: Can burrow through nonmagical unworked earth/stone with o disturbing material it moves through.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Persistence of Stone (Recharge: Short/Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: When reduced to below half its hp max Fossil Barrage recharges.

special_abilities.name: Roiling Roots
special_abilities.desc: Its stony roots make the ground within 15 ft. of it difficult terrain for creatures other than the rockwood.

special_abilities.name: Towering Reach
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't have disadvantage on ranged attack rolls from being within 5 ft. of a hostile creature though it may still have disadvantage from other sources.
